medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately 8 hours of RLQ pain that started at 2 am, waking the patient from sleep. The pain is different from previous IBS-related pain and has not occurred in the past. No nausea, vomiting, fevers, or chills reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), diagnosed ___ years ago, presents with hyperactive bowel activity and diarrhea, controlled with diet.
